Title: Russia's terror campaign continues as Russians again targeted civ...
Description: Russia's terror campaign continues as Russians again targeted civilians in Ukraine's Sumy region with wissile strikes. Among targets, 12 residential hi-rise buildings, key infrastructure facilities, two educational institutions and other social sector objects were destroyed or damaged.Rescue efforts are ongoing.

Title: 🎬 Overnight, drones attacked Russia. In the Smolensk region, a f...
Description: Overnight, drones attacked Russia. In the Smolensk region, a fire broke out at an oil depot following the strikes, and fuel spilled in the lubricants and fuel storage.Russian authorities said several drones were shot down over a military range in North Ossetia. Both Vladikavkaz and Kazan airports have suspended operations.In total, Russia’s Defense Ministry claimed that they shot down 68 Ukrainian drones, including 17 over Crimea.

Title: 🖼 Russians launched missile and drone attacks on Ukraine overnig...
Description: Russians launched missile and drone attacks on Ukraine overnight and into the morning, with explosions reported in Kyiv and several other cities.In one of the capital’s districts, debris from downed missiles crashed onto the roof of a private building. Air raid sirens are still echoing across the country.

Title: 🖼 With two days still remaining to finish out the month, Russian...
Description: With two days still remaining to finish out the month, Russian losses in Ukraine are looking to set yet another record.Source: General Staff

Title: 🖼 Three years into their '3 day' military operation, with over 4...
Description: Three years into their '3 day' military operation, with over 45,000 Russian casualties per month and a collapsing economy, Russians increasingly have only terror tactics on which to rely.Tonight, Russians hacked a Ukrainian TV channel, attempting to sow terror with a fake missile warning.
